video_title: Men are AFRAID of being CANCELED
transcript:
men are afraid to approach women because
they are afraid of rejection not only
because rejection by definition is
frustrating and generally perceived to
be painful but because rejection in this
domain carries a special threat namely
that they will be perceived as creepy
this is especially true in the shadow of
the metoo movement men are afraid that
not only will they be rejected but they
will be shamed or canceled as a
consequence of expressing sexual
interest
